snippet.title: Pirate's Dynasty - Official Announcement
snippet.description:
Check out the teaser for Pirate's Dynasty, an upcoming game featuring a mix of genres, including survival, base and city builder, and ship construction elements combined with roleplaying and naval combat. 

In Pirate's Dynasty, fight dangerous battles on the high seas, grab your friends and collect valuable booty in multiplayer mode and build your stronghold. Together with your crew, you will rule the huge procedurally generated world as a notorious buccaneer.

Pirate's Dynasty is coming to PC.
